item.title: FHN
item.description: score:129 Chances: First Horizon Corporation (FHN) operates as a financial holding company with a diverse range of financial products and services. The company has been recognized for its commitment to employee health and well-being, as well as for its support of adoption-friendly workplaces, showcasing a positive corporate culture.
